title: Can you get a Guinness World Record by mistake? - Quora

response.answer_text: making a world record or breaking someone else record is not at all everyone’s cup of tea but their are some of the instances where an individual accidentally broke a record of other individual and made a new world record so here are some of them have a look 1 Super Mario 64 speed run in this particular game player tries to get through the game as fast as possible similarly a player named nero was given challenge by his mate to see who could finish the game with more speed to the surprise where nero wasn’t even trying to break the record eventually ended up breaking the record by finishing the game in 23 seconds which was better than the previous record 2 world thinnest glass the team of researchers at cornell university were in the middle of creating graphene but they soon realized that they have accidentally made the world thinnest glass which is just two atom thick i hope i helped you out with your answer thanks ;)

Possible yes. A very fat Scottish man fasted under medical supervision for a year and lost all the weight with no negative side effect. He holds the world record but this was not the initial intention.
